data.text: @alternatem2 @greg_travis @_AbolishPolice_ @DCDoc33 @Squanus1 Troll accusing others of ableism engages in ageism.
@Jstanthrnobdy @greg_travis Please tell me what I have said that is a lie.

@greg_travis @Jstanthrnobdy Have you updated it since May of last year?
@netback @Jstanthrnobdy It does from where I sit https://t.co/p4GGAL4k2B
@greg_travis @Jstanthrnobdy Both. That is what they try to tell us but the data sure doesn’t add up.

@netback @Jstanthrnobdy What is nowhere nearly as effective as promised?  Vaccination, masks or both?

Because there is very powerful evidence that both are extremely effective when used properly

@Jstanthrnobdy @greg_travis That doesn’t even make sense. I’m not anti-vax I just think like most medical interventions there’s a lot of nuance in who needs it. Add to that  the fact that they’re no where nearly as effective as they promised.

@greg_travis "Over the last month alone, from January 31 to February 27, the CDC Data Tracker Demographics section has added 212 pediatric deaths, a rate of 7.5 children per day. Nearly 70% of these, 148, occurred in the last 13 days, a rate of over 11 per day."

https://t.co/IhtmTtRriG
@greg_travis This makes me sick - and the fact that people don’t seem to care, sicker
